sentences.en: A binding contract is thereupon concluded.
sentences.cn: 具有拘束力的合同就此便告缔结.

sentences.en: And thereupon he sat down across the brandy cask, and began to fill a pipe.
sentences.cn: 说着,他就坐到了白兰地酒桶上, 开始装烟斗.

sentences.en: He thereupon asked her to marry him.
The audience thereupon rose cheering to their feet.
The girl thereupon fell into such deep reflection that conversation languished.
sentences.cn: 随即这个少女便陷入了沉思,于是谈话冷下去了.

sentences.en: The knight carried a shield with a cross painted thereupon.
sentences.cn: 骑士拿着绘着十字的盾牌.

sentences.en: The police arrived. Thereupon the mob scattered.
sentences.cn: 警察来了,这群乌合之众也随之散去.

sentences.en: The President appeared, thereupon the people applauded.
sentences.cn: 总统一出现, 人们随即就鼓掌.

sentences.en: Thereupon I felt myself to be reborn and to have gone through open doors into paradise. "
sentences.cn: 从而我感到自己获得了再生,并通过敞开的大门进入天堂. ”

sentences.en: Thereupon she made hay of the weighing - in enclosure.
sentences.cn: 这样一来,她可把这个骑师休息场给扰乱了.

sentences.en: Thereupon the jury brought her in guilty.
sentences.cn: 因此陪审官断定她有罪.

sentences.en: Thereupon the whole audience began cheering.
sentences.cn: 于是，全体观众开始欢呼。

sentences.en: Thereupon this phrase in the preamble was depleted.
sentences.cn: 因此,前言中的这一句话就被删去了.
那么,她该怎么办 呢 ?

sentences.en: Thereupon, her companions, duly encouraged, jumped on the car and pulled Hurstwood over.
sentences.cn: 这一下, 她的同伴们大受鼓舞, 跳上车来,把赫斯渥拖下了车.

sentences.en: Thereupon, we knew, our endeavor was valuable.
sentences.cn: 于是, 我们知道, 我们的努力是有价值的!

words.tran_cn: 于是；随即；关于那，在其上

trans.tran_en: immediately after something else has happened, and usually as a result of it
